name: B2Z: Who dares wins
description:
Hello and thank you for looking at this page.

B2Z: Who dares wins is a Military FPS designed to provide the gamer with action and an enjoyable experience.

Video footage of the latest build can be found here:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NWtf5Iequhs

I am looking for feedback constructive ideally, so if you can please email the following address with your feedback.

alexhamilton22"at"gmail.com

This is currently a prototype and has only got 1 level in the game as it stands, I hope to add more with weekly updates where possible.

Thank you once again, and I hope you all enjoy the game.

ScotGames.

LATEST UPDATES 11/08/15

A new build is uploaded basically some changes made to the first level and different start and finish screens.

LATEST UPDATES 28/09/15

Some work done to improve the first level most notably near the end of the level.

Menus returned to defaults due to further work required on them.

Hoping to have the menus fixed asap.

LATEST UPDATES: 17/11/15

Have recompiled using the latest updated engine and you should see a big boost in game performance.
